entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. High 15.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. Local amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. High 15. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: A few showers ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Local amount 5 mm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening then west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
